file_content.text: Taris is ours to ruin thanks to you. Well done.
Excellent work taking down Orda. Now that our base is secure, I'm sure your talents are needed elsewhere on Taris.
Report to Darth Gravus. He insists on working with you personally.
The Republic artillery lies just outside our base.
Your arrival was unexpected. The supreme commander of Imperial forces on Taris has requested a word.
Darth Gravus--the new arrival.
Darth Gravus--they are here.
I sensed your presence. Such mastery of the Force is rare... and impressive. Care to lend your lightsaber to Taris's destruction?
When it comes to breaking planets, Intelligence knows best.
I produce better results.
Your Imperial career is impeccable... and littered with bodies. Just the agent I need for Taris's annihilation.
You want a worldwide extermination, you call a professional.
I'm better suited for the job.
You've left a long trail of blood in your wake, hunter. Just the brutality I need for Taris's destruction--if you're interested.
I don't grace every recruit with my presence, but you're obviously a special case. Care to join our destruction of Taris?
This planet will be a wasteland when I'm finished.
Destruction is my specialty.
Excellent. I remember when I burned with such passion.
Breaking a planet requires a subtle hand.
I'll gladly lend my expertise.
I'm sure you'll provide just the right... touch.
I don't demolish planets until there's a price on the table.
Depends on the pay.
The Empire promises great rewards to those who join our cause. We'll discuss specifics later.
The Republic is trying to rebuild Taris. I'm here to drive them off and complete the planet's ruin.
Why fight over this junk yard?
It's simple, really. The Republic's trying to rebuild Taris. We're here to demolish it.
There's never a good reason to destroy an entire planet.
Sounds like overkill.
The Republic's reconstruction of Taris is an offense to the Empire. We must answer without mercy.
If you desire to stand by my side and serve the Empire, swat down the Republic artillery firing on our base.
I'll crush every Republic weapon I see.
As you command.
Whatever the Republic's packing, I'll smash it. Standard rates apply.
You pay, I work.
Maybe. I'm a tad busy.
Make the time. Wound the Republic.
Seek me out when the artillery's in pieces. Then, we'll discuss your role in the greater conflict.
Count me out. [Refuse quest]
Think of the devastation you'll miss. Such a pity.
Welcome to Taris, my lord. I'm Captain Helid, Imperial Military Command.
Welcome to Taris. I'm Captain Helid, Imperial Military Command.
The Republic can't hold out forever.
